author: x2048
long_description:
Adds sunlight shadows to the world by tweaking the lightmap.

* Shadows are updated dynamically as you move around
* Shadows are cached in the map and are not recomputed if you move in the same areas unless necessary
* You can choose beteen fixed shadows and following the Sun

**NB:** If you disable the mod, the shadows will still be stored in your map. Use `/fixlight` command or 
WorldEdit/Terraform mods to remove then afterwards.
name: shadows
short_description: Adds sunlight shadows to your world
title: Funny Shadows
